title: Dhaka University Ground
text:
Dhaka University Ground is a major public ground hosting matches of domestic and inter-collegiate <a href="cricket">cricket</a> and <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Dhaka">Dhaka</a>, the capital of <a href="Bangladesh">Bangladesh</a>.
Only <a href="First-class%20cricket">first class</a> cricket match held on 21 May 1966 between <a href="Dacca%20cricket%20team">Decca</a> Vs. <a href="Public%20Works%20Department%20cricket%20team">Public Works Department</a>.
The ground hosted inter-hall, intra hall sports every year. It is also used for <a href="University%20of%20Dhaka">university's</a> convocation ceremony.
